content.raw:
I was planning to wait to do this until the fix has been merged into bullet's master branch. If I added the `#ifdef`'s right now, tests would fail if building against the current state of bullet's master branch.

I thought the bullet PR would be merged quickly, but I can never guess correctly. I can decline and resubmit if you want to wait for the bullet PR.
